Amid all the Oscars controversy, Halle Berry managed to make a splash of her own as she went skinny dipping after this year's ceremony. 
The actress - who won the Best Actress prize back in 2001 for her role in Monster's Ball - stunned at the ceremony on Sunday night, stepping out in a pink Atelier Versace gown for the glitzy ceremony. 
However, she hinted that the glamorous red carpet styles weren't always first choice as she shared a steamy video with her followers on Instagram. Halle Berry went skinny dipping (Photo: Instagram) She stripped off in a video shared after the Oscars (Photo: Instagram) She said she couldn't wait to get her dress off (Photo: Instagram) 
Set to Bruno Mars' smooth hit Versace on the Floor, the clip - which could've been filmed earlier, judging by the sunlight - shows her walking towards a pool. 
Writing alongside the slow motion clip, she said: "After a long award show a girl can't wait to take it off!" The steamy clip was shared on Instagram (Photo: Instagram) She dived into the pool (Photo: Instagram) 
It's been four long years since Halle appeared on the Oscars red carpet, but she made sure she was back in style on Sunday evening. 
Although the star admitted she had to practice in her heels, she didn't miss a beat as she arrived at the ceremony. Halle Berry stunned at the Oscars on Sunday night (Photo: Getty Images North America) She nailed her look at the Vanity Fair party (Photo: WireImage) 
Speaking about her style, she told E! Online: "I was choosing between five Versace dresses this year and this was the winner. 
"It feels romantic and feminine and made me feel good." Like us on Facebook
